remarks: The intersection (infimum) of a nonempty subset of ` CH ` belongs to ` CH ` .  Part of Theorem 3.13 of [Beran] p. 108.  Also part of Definition 3.4-1 in [MegPav2000] p. 2345 (PDF p. 8).  (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-1999.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: chintcl $p |- ( ( A C_ CH /\ A =/= (/) ) -> |^| A e. CH ) $.
